title: Cody Simpson drops new song about Miley Cyrus titled Golden Thing and she reacts on social media
text:
After teasing his new song Golden Thing on Tuesday, Cody Simpson dropped the new song on Thursday, which is inspired by new girlfriend Miley Cyrus.

Simpson, 22, debuted the new song Golden Thing on his YouTube channel Thursday night

He also teased the song with two cryptic tweets on Wednesday, before offering a heartfelt tweet on Thursday just before dropping the song.

Cyrus responded Thursday night on her Instagram story, sharing a screen grab of the artwork, stating, 'MY HEART.'

On Wednesday, he teased the opening lyrics, tweeting, 'crystal dream cali queen radiant hand vibrant sand.'

Last week, Simpson opened up about his relationship with Cyrus, who he had been friends with for years, in an interview with People.

He also teased that he wrote a song for her last week, and while he didn't reveal the title, he said that Cyrus was 'forcing' him to release it.

'I wrote her a song this week that she’s pretty much forcing me to put out,' Simpson said.

The singer also stated that the song is, something I wrote for her while she was sick this week.'

Cyrus shared a number of photos and videos from her time in the hospital when she was suffering from tonsillitis.

He also added that, since they were friends long before they started dating, it wasn't a 'crazy sudden thing.'

'The reason why it hasn’t been a really crazy sudden thing is just because we’ve been friends for so long,' Simpson said.

'[We] found each other again in a space where we’re both not partying, working real hard, and it just keeps things healthy and it’s good,' he added.

'Any girlfriends I’ve had in the past has always been immediate romance and so it’s a different experience having been friends with somebody before and it developing naturally into something more.”
